metadata.title: CVE-2022-49015 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: hsr: Fix potential use-after-freeThe skb is delivered to netif_rx() which may free it, after calling this,dereferencing skb may trigger use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
